body_html: OK, having read the script, it seems pretty fragile, in the sense that it's probably going to take time for us to iron out all of the weird and wonderful ways our users can use our software and handle all of the edge cases correctly. Maybe it would make sense for this to exist out of repo for now, living in some place where we can edit and tell users to use it more quickly than the release cycle? E.g., user submits a Windows problem, we say, "Download this script and run it and try to follow its instructions". Tell me what you think.
